text:
Hi,
the JNDIRealm provided by you does not work the IPlanet 5.1 or I am
to stupid because Tomcat don´t get the password. On the other hand there may be 
people who don´t want to provide the password to an application.

So I have changed it to use a new Context with the password to validate
the user. It is attached.

By the way with my tests I have observed that the Context.search() method seems 
not to be thread safe.

Please treat my a attachment as a working hint. It will not be a perfect 
solution.

Best regards

Thomas
creator: thomas2.maesing@bgs-ag.de

text:
Current version of JNDI Realm supports authentication by binding to the
directory with the username and password supplied by the user. This should
enable it to be used with IPlanet 5.1.
creator: j.g.holman@qmul.ac.uk
